text: Conrad Janis (February 11, 1928 - February 1, 2022) was an American jazz trombonist and actor. He was born in New York City. He starred in Margie, The Brasher Doubloon, The Buddy Holly Story and in the Goldie Hawn comedy The Duchess and the Dirtwater Fox. He also starred as Mindy McConnell's father Frederick on Mork & Mindy. Janis died on February 1, 2022 in Los Angeles, California ten days before his 95th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American trombonists Category:American jazz musicians Category:Actors from New York City Category:Musicians from New York City
title: Conrad Janis
